subject: Awful service - #SSN3046
description_text:
Hello,



I am extremely unhappy with the service I have received. I placed my order on 21st October 2025, and despite the stated delivery timeframe of 9–15 days, I still have not received my order.



I have been repeatedly told that there was an attempted delivery, yet my address is correct and no delivery attempt was made. I have asked multiple times for clarification on why this has happened, but nobody has provided a response.



This order was intended to be a gift, and the occasion has now long passed. I have not been given any updated tracking information to even understand where my package currently is. The lack of communication and transparency is extremely disappointing.



If you cannot guarantee that my package will arrive by the end of this week, I am requesting that a full refund be processed immediately.



Please respond as soon as possible with an update on my order status.



Thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi Chelsea Zealand,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We have noted that your shipment has been delayed and will immediately investigate the matter. We will promptly arrange for a replacement shipment via express delivery.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045985077978

Subject: Re: Urgent Follow-Up – Replacement Shipment Still Not Received



Hi,



I am following up again regarding the replacement shipment you stated would be sent via express delivery. It is now the 22nd, and I still have not received the pedals.



It has been over a month since I placed my original order, and this level of delay is completely unacceptable. This item was intended as a present, and the ongoing issues have caused significant inconvenience. Given the repeated missed delivery timeframes and lack of resolution, I believe compensation is appropriate.



I need a clear and immediate update on the status of my order, including accurate tracking information and confirmation of when I can expect the delivery.



Please address this matter urgently.



Thank you,

Chelsea Zealand


Sent from my iPhone

>

Hi Chelsea Zealand,    I apologize for not responding to you promptly. It appears there was an issue with your address, resulting in a failed delivery. Please verify your address:  Chelsea Zealand  Acre View Wainfleet Road  Boston  PE21 9RN  United Kingdom  +44 7803 793884

Can you explain what would have happened?

Sent from my iPhone
